comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Otto Bannard was a Republican candidate for Mayor of New York in 1909, running against Wm. Randolph Hearst of Hearst Castle fame and also William Gaynor, the Democratic candidate and victor. Below is Wikipedia link to the election: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_City_mayoralty_elections#1...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: OTTO BANNARD. October 31, 1909. Mr. BANNARD'S qualifications for election as Mayor do not depend upon his opponents' disqualifications. The reasons why they should not be elected are supplied by themselves, and are so abundant that the subject need not be pursued in detail. The idea of a Mayor of the personal characteristics which Mr. GAYNOR'S candidacy has disclosed is repulsive. Source: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E06EED8113EE033A...
